sendMessages.label: Tumi a wɔde ma ho kwan na wɔde nkra bi amena .
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 kyerɛ sɛ asɔremma nyinaa tumi de nkrasɛm mena, na dodow a dodow no yɛ kɛse no kyerɛ sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wonya kwan a ɛkorɔn .

invite.label: kwan a wɔhwehwɛ sɛ wɔde to nsa frɛ asɔremma foforo .
invite.tooltip: Set a obetumi ato nsa afrɛ asɔremma foforo aba dan no mu .

kick.label: Kick fi kwan a wɔhwehwɛ no level .
kick.tooltip: Set wɔn a wobetumi apam dan no mufo .

ban.label: kwan a wɔhwehwɛ sɛ wɔde siw asɔremma kwan .
ban.tooltip: Set a obetumi asiw dan mufo kwan .

roomSettings.label: Sesa kwan a wɔhwehwɛ no gyinabea a ɛwɔ dan mu nhyehyɛe mu .
roomSettings.tooltip: Set wɔn a wobetumi ayɛ nsakrae wɔ dan no nhyehyɛe mu .

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Permission Level Range: 0-100, dodow a dodow no ara kyerɛ sɛ dodow a ɛkɔ soro no ho hia .
